00018 bool CBodyDialog::Initialize() {
00019         if (!BodyModel::Initialize())
00020                 return false;
00021         m_initialized = true;
00022         return true;
00023 }
00024 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00025 void CBodyDialog::DeInitialize() {
00026         BodyModel::DeInitialize();
00027         // body size priors
00028         m_heightM = 170;
00029         m_heightS = 20;
00030         m_widthM = 70;
00031         m_widthS = 20;
00032         m_minHeight = 120;
00033         m_maxHeight = 200;
00034         m_minWidth = 30;
00035         m_maxWidth = 120;
00036         m_iterations = 20;
00037         m_randomness = 0.25;
00038 
00039         // prior probability penlties
00040         p_number = 0.05;
00041         p_new = 2;
00042         p_delete = 2;
00043         p_distance = 1;
00044         p_height = 0.05;
00045         p_width = 0.05;
00046         p_object = 0.5;
00047         p_background = 1; 
00048         p_foreground = 0.1; 
00049         p_abnormalsize = 0.1;
00050 
00051         // jump-diffusion probabilities
00052         p_add = 0.1;
00053         p_remove = 0.1;
00054         p_establish = 0.1;
00055         p_break = 0.1;
00056         p_exchange = 0.1;
00057         p_update = 0.2;
00058         p_diffuse = 0.3;
00059 }

00061 void CBodyDialog::DoDataExchange(CDataExchange* pDX)
00062 {
00063         CPropertyPage::DoDataExchange(pDX);
00064         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_HEIGHTM, m_heightM);
00065         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_HEIGHTS, m_heightS);
00066         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_WIDTHM, m_widthM);
00067         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_WIDTHS, m_widthS);
00068         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_HEIGHTMIN, m_minHeight);
00069         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_HEIGHTMAX, m_maxHeight);
00070         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_WIDTHMIN, m_minWidth);
00071         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_WIDTHMAX, m_maxWidth);
00072 
00073         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_PNONE, p_number);
00074         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_PNEW, p_new);
00075         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_PDELETE, p_delete);
00076         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_PDISTANCE, p_distance);
00077         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_PHEIGHT, p_height);
00078         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_PWIDTH, p_width);
00079         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_POBJECT, p_object);
00080         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_PBG, p_background); 
00081         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_PFG, p_foreground); 
00082         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_PABNORMAL, p_abnormalsize);
00083 
00084         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_ITERATIONS, m_iterations);
00085         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_RANDOMNESS, m_randomness);
00086 
00087         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_ADD, p_add);

00089         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_ESTABLISH, p_establish);

00096 void CBodyDialog::Serialize( CArchive& ar ) {
00097         CObject::Serialize(ar);
00098         if( ar.IsStoring()) {
00099                 ar << m_heightM << m_heightS << m_widthM << m_widthS;
00100                 ar << m_minHeight << m_maxHeight << m_minWidth << m_maxWidth << m_iterations << m_randomness;
00101                 ar << p_number << p_new << p_delete << p_distance << p_height << p_width;
00102                 ar << p_object << p_background << p_foreground << p_abnormalsize;
00103                 ar << p_add << p_remove << p_establish << p_break << p_exchange << p_update << p_diffuse;
00104         }
00105         else {
00106                 ar >> m_heightM >> m_heightS >> m_widthM >> m_widthS;
00107                 ar >> m_minHeight >> m_maxHeight >> m_minWidth >> m_maxWidth >> m_iterations >> m_randomness;
00108                 ar >> p_number >> p_new >> p_delete >> p_distance >> p_height >> p_width;
00109                 ar >> p_object >> p_background >> p_foreground >> p_abnormalsize;
00110                 ar >> p_add >> p_remove >> p_establish >> p_break >> p_exchange >> p_update >> p_diffuse;
00111         }
00112 }
